trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RowUpdated" name="RowUpdated" href=""></xref> event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_RowUpdated" name="RowUpdated" href=""> </xref> evento di un provider di dati .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdated` event message is typically raised when an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row is completed.
trans-unit.target: Il `RowUpdated` messaggio di evento viene solitamente generato quando un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>a una riga è stata completata.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> inviati tramite un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> eseguita quando <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement executed.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di istruzione SQL eseguita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> inviati tramite un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> eseguita quando <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> eseguita quando <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.
trans-unit.target: Copia i riferimenti alle righe modificate in una matrice specificata.

trans-unit.source: `array` must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> in length.
trans-unit.target: `array`deve essere almeno <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>lunghezza.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Genera una classe <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>per un'istanza null di <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> cui copiare.

trans-unit.source: Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.
trans-unit.target: Copia i riferimenti alle righe modificate in una matrice specificata.

trans-unit.source: `array` must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> + `arrayIndex` in length.
trans-unit.target: `array`deve essere almeno <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>+ `arrayIndex` lunghezza.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Genera una classe <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>per un'istanza null di <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> cui copiare.

trans-unit.source: The index in the array to start copying into.
trans-unit.target: Indice nella matrice da cui iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> was executed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutti gli errori generati dal provider di dati .NET Framework quando il <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>è stato eseguito.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> was executed.
trans-unit.target: Gli errori generati dal provider di dati .NET Framework quando il <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>è stato eseguito.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di righe modificate, inserite o eliminate dall'esecuzione dell'istruzione SQL.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di righe modificate, inserite o eliminate; 0 se nessuna riga è interessata o l'istruzione non è riuscita. e -1 per le istruzioni SELECT.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> inviati tramite un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: When batching is enabled, the value of this property will be null.
trans-unit.target: Quando è abilitato l'invio in batch, il valore di questa proprietà sarà null.

trans-unit.source: Updated rows can be accessed through one of the `RowUpdatedEventArgs.CopyToRows` methods.
trans-unit.target: Le righe aggiornate sono accessibili tramite uno del `RowUpdatedEventArgs.CopyToRows` metodi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> inviati tramite un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows processed in a batch of updated records.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di righe elaborate in un batch di record aggiornati.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> that specifies the number of row processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>che specifica il numero di righe elaborate.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of SQL statement executed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di istruzione SQL eseguita.

trans-unit.source: StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
trans-unit.target: StatementType può essere uno dei valori seguenti: - selezionare - inserimento - aggiornamento - eliminazione

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement executed.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di istruzione SQL eseguita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> del <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> inviati tramite un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> inviati tramite un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>
